message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $115.  It's in great condition and worth every penny. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to make a deal, but I have to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $90 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit, but I can't go below $105.  Let's split the difference and make this happen!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $105 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $102.50. Can we make a deal at this price?
